title: Strengthening Organizational Development Competencies: Mathematics-Based Microlearning for Sustainable Workforce Development

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental arithmetic skills and comprehension of basic job-related mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can solve resource allocation problems occurring in work environments through mathematical modeling with 85% accuracy.
Learners can analyze energy consumption optimization cases and propose at least three sustainable solutions.
Learners can evaluate workplace health and safety risk factors with over 70% accuracy using statistical data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
